dimensions.label: Risk Tolerance
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin approach uncertainty?

options.description: Your FarTwin will take bold and decisive action in the face of uncertainty, often disregarding caution or risk assessment.
Your FarTwin will approach uncertainty with a conservative mindset, prioritizing stability and security over potential gains or rewards.

dimensions.label: Financial Priorities
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin allocate resources?

options.description: Your FarTwin will prioritize thriftiness and cost-effectiveness, seeking to minimize expenses and maximize value for every dollar.
Your FarTwin will be willing to invest in people, experiences, or causes that bring them joy and fulfillment, often at the expense of personal financial security.

dimensions.label: Social Engagement
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin interact with others?

options.description: Your FarTwin will prefer to spend time alone, engaging in solo activities or recharging in quiet solitude.
Your FarTwin will thrive in social environments, seeking out opportunities to connect with others and build relationships.

dimensions.label: Time Management
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin prioritize tasks?

options.description: Your FarTwin will focus on delivering high-quality work, often prioritizing attention to detail and precision over efficiency or speed.
Your FarTwin will prioritize practicality and productivity, seeking to complete tasks effectively and efficiently, even if it means sacrificing some quality or perfection.

dimensions.label: Innovation Approach
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin find new ideas?

options.description: Your FarTwin will rely on established methods and tried-and-true approaches, seeking to build upon existing knowledge and expertise.
Your FarTwin will be open to new experiences, willing to take calculated risks and explore unconventional solutions to achieve innovation.

dimensions.label: Conflict Resolution
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin handle disagreements?

options.description: Your FarTwin will confront conflicts head-on, using assertive language and direct confrontation to resolve disputes.
Your FarTwin will seek to avoid conflict whenever possible, instead focusing on finding mutually beneficial solutions and compromises.

dimensions.label: Learning Style
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin acquire knowledge?

options.description: Your FarTwin will learn best through visual aids, such as images, videos, or diagrams.
Your FarTwin will prefer to absorb information through listening and discussion, engaging with others to clarify understanding.

dimensions.label: Technical Comfort
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin interact with technology?

options.description: Your FarTwin will struggle to navigate digital tools and platforms, requiring assistance or guidance to access information.
Your FarTwin will be highly proficient in technology, using digital tools with ease and expertise to streamline tasks and enhance productivity.
